org.apache.hadoop.fs.http.client

Interface WebHDFSConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KerberosWebHDFSConnection, PseudoWebHDFSConnection

    public interface WebHDFSConnection
    ===== HTTP GET
  • OPEN (see FileSystem.open)
  • GETFILESTATUS (see FileSystem.getFileStatus)
  • LISTSTATUS (see FileSystem.listStatus)
  • GETCONTENTSUMMARY (see FileSystem.getContentSummary)
  • GETFILECHECKSUM (see FileSystem.getFileChecksum)
  • GETHOMEDIRECTORY (see FileSystem.getHomeDirectory)
  • GETDELEGATIONTOKEN (see FileSystem.getDelegationToken)
  • GETDELEGATIONTOKENS (see FileSystem.getDelegationTokens)
    ===== HTTP PUT
  • CREATE (see FileSystem.create)
  • MKDIRS (see FileSystem.mkdirs)
  • CREATESYMLINK (see FileContext.createSymlink)
  • RENAME (see FileSystem.rename)
  • SETREPLICATION (see FileSystem.setReplication)
  • SETOWNER (see FileSystem.setOwner)
  • SETPERMISSION (see FileSystem.setPermission)
  • SETTIMES (see FileSystem.setTimes)
  • RENEWDELEGATIONTOKEN (see FileSystem.renewDelegationToken)
  • CANCELDELEGATIONTOKEN (see FileSystem.cancelDelegationToken)
    ===== HTTP POST
    APPEND (see FileSystem.append)
    ===== HTTP DELETE
    DELETE (see FileSystem.delete)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String append(String path, InputStream is)
      curl -i -X POST "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=APPEND[&buffersize=]"
      String create(String path, InputStream is)
      CREATE curl -i -X PUT "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=CREATE [&overwrite=][&blocksize=][&replication=] [&permission=][&buffersize=]"
      String createSymLink(String srcPath, String destPath)
      CREATESYMLINK curl -i -X PUT "http://:/?op=CREATESYMLINK &destination=[&createParent=]"
      String delete(String path)
      DELETE curl -i -X DELETE "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=DELETE [&recursive=]"
      String getContentSummary(String path)
      GETCONTENTSUMMARY curl -i "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=GETCONTENTSUMMARY"
      String getFileCheckSum(String path)
      GETFILECHECKSUM curl -i "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=GETFILECHECKSUM"
      String getFileStatus(String path)
      GETFILESTATUS curl -i "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=GETFILESTATUS"
      String getHomeDirectory()
      GETHOMEDIRECTORY curl -i "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=GETHOMEDIRECTORY"
      String listStatus(String path)
      LISTSTATUS curl -i "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=LISTSTATUS"
      String mkdirs(String path)
      MKDIRS curl -i -X PUT "http://:/?op=MKDIRS[&permission=]"
      String open(String path, OutputStream os)
      OPEN curl -i -L "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=OPEN [&offset=][&length=][&buffersize=]"
      String rename(String srcPath, String destPath)
      RENAME curl -i -X PUT "http://:/?op=RENAME &destination=[&createParent=]"
      String setOwner(String path)
      SETOWNER curl -i -X PUT "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=SETOWNER [&owner=][&group=]"
      String setPermission(String path)
      SETPERMISSION curl -i -X PUT "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=SETPERMISSION [&permission=]"
      String setReplication(String path)
      SETREPLICATION curl -i -X PUT "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=SETREPLICATION [&replication=]"
      String setTimes(String path)
      SETTIMES curl -i -X PUT "http://:/webhdfs/v1/?op=SETTIMES [&modificationtime=][&accesstime=]"
